content: A 1997 film titled 'Titanic' featured what famous line, spoken by Leonardo DiCaprio, while standing at the bow of the ship?

I believe the famous line you're referring to is "I'm king of the world!" This was spoken by Leonardo DiCaprio's character, Jack Dawson, in the 1997 film 'Titanic' directed by James Cameron. The scene takes place when Jack and Rose, played by Kate Winslet, are standing at the bow of the ship, and Jack feels invincible and free, prompting him to shout this phrase. This moment has become one of the most iconic in cinematic history.
